! cue fmt --list .
cmp stdout expect-stdout
cmp stderr expect-stderr

-- expect-stdout --
unformatted.cue : Not formatted correctly
-- expect-stderr --
Error: Not all Cue files are formatted correctly (--list provided)
Not all Cue files are formatted correctly (--list provided)
-- formatted.cue --
package main

min: 1
-- unformatted.cue --
package main

 max: 2
